heading: Wave 1 of BlizzCon Tickets on Sale July 8th, 10am PDT
content: With wave 1 of going on sale in only a few hours, we wanted to give a quick run down of what to do and expect. Got to know when BlizzCon is taking place first before committing to going. The event is happening November 3rd & 4th (Friday & Saturday). BlizzCon will be taking place at the This year is a little different from past years. There are two ticket options to choose from - tickets will be a good choice for the vast majority of people attending the event. As a veteran of 7 BlizzCon events, choose wisely. Hotel prices in the area can range from just under $200 a night to almost $400 USD! Even if you and 1 to 3 friends are packing a room like sardines, it can still be a large part of your trip. is the official ticket vendor for BlizzCon this year. There is a more restrictive this year as well, plan accordingly! Go luck when wave 1 of BlizzCon tickets going on sale! continues to release new and updated guides for the Season 1. Additionally, as BlizzCon draws near, some of our own Content Creators will be there and can't wait to enjoy the con with you. If you haven't already, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development. Keep on hacking and slashing!
